name: FelixTrader
short_description:
Source is available at https://github.com/zicore-/FelixTrader

FelixTrader is the front end and implementation of the FelixTrader.API and the target of FelixTrader.API is to be a unified API for all Crypto Coin Markets. It features all the abstraction mechanisms to implement another Exchange without alot effort.

Exchange Features:

-Dashboard
-Order Book
-Recent Trades
-Create Orders
-Cancel Orders
-Order Overview

-General Features
-API Keys Management
-Encrypted Settings for the API Keys and Secrets
-Bitcoin Address Lookup via Blockchain (Wallet Balances)

The application creates two different settings files. Both located at %appdata%/FelixTrader

ExchangeSettings.aes.json stores the API Keys and Secrets and is encrypted with a password you choose on first login.

AppSettings.json stores public addresses for the Blockchain balance lookup.

If you lose the password, you have to manually remove or rename the ExchangeSettings.aes.json file, from AppData.
